name: Luke Skywalker
description: Born amid galactic turmoil and hidden on Tatooine as an infant, this farm boy grows up under his uncle's care, oblivious to his extraordinary heritage and the pivotal role he will one day play in the galaxy's fate.

name: C-3PO
description: A protocol droid assembled by a young slave on Tatooine from salvaged parts, this fluent-in-six-million-forms-of-communication droid serves various masters after a memory wipe, his anxious personality masking an extraordinary origin.

name: R2-D2
description: An astromech droid serving the Royal Naboo Security Forces whose bravery and resourcefulness save his companions repeatedly, his memory banks storing secrets that will spark a rebellion against tyranny in decades to come.

name: Darth Vader
description: A towering Sith Lord encased in black armor whose mechanical breathing strikes fear across the galaxy, this mysterious enforcer serves Emperor Palpatine during the Clone Wars, his true identity shrouded in tragedy and darkness.

name: Leia Organa
description: Born at the Clone Wars' end and adopted into Alderaan's royal family, this infant princess grows up surrounded by political intrigue, her future as a beacon of hope and rebellion leader already written in the stars.

name: Owen Lars
description: A moisture farmer on Tatooine, stepson of Shmi Skywalker, who reluctantly agrees to raise his stepbrother's infant son, his fierce protectiveness stemming from witnessing how Jedi involvement brings tragedy to those he loves.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
description: A Jedi Padawan trained by Qui-Gon Jinn who becomes knighted after his master's death, taking young Anakin Skywalker as his own apprentice, his unwavering dedication to the Jedi Code tested through the crucible of the Clone Wars.

name: Anakin Skywalker
description: Discovered as a gifted slave child on Tatooine with the highest midi-chlorian count ever recorded, this prophesied Chosen One trains under Obi-Wan Kenobi, his extraordinary piloting skills and mechanical genius making him a legendary Clone Wars hero.

name: Wilhuff Tarkin
description: A ruthless naval officer from Eriadu who advocates for military expansion and fear-based control, his cold pragmatism earns him influence during the Clone Wars, rising through ranks alongside a certain Senator from Naboo.

name: Chewbacca
description: A mighty Wookiee warrior from Kashyyyk who fights alongside Jedi Master Yoda during the Clone Wars invasion of his homeworld, this loyal being's path later crosses with a scoundrel, beginning a friendship spanning decades.

name: Jabba Desilijic Tiure
description: The colossal Hutt crime lord who dominates Tatooine's underworld from his palace throne, his criminal empire stretches across the Outer Rim, dealing with bounty hunters, smugglers, and even Jedi seeking transportation during the Clone Wars.

name: Yoda
description: Grand Master of the Jedi Order for over eight centuries, this diminutive green being trains generations of Jedi, his wisdom unparalleled, yet his certainty in the Order's infallibility blinds him to corruption growing within the Republic.

name: Palpatine
description: A charming Senator from Naboo who becomes Supreme Chancellor during the Trade Federation invasion, his masterful manipulation of political crises and secret identity as a Sith Lord allow him to consolidate power while appearing benevolent.

name: Boba Fett
description: An unaltered clone raised as son by the legendary bounty hunter Jango Fett on Kamino, this young boy witnesses his father's death at a Jedi's hands, vowing to follow his footsteps and become the galaxy's most feared hunter.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
description: A maverick Jedi Master who follows the living Force rather than strict Council doctrine, his discovery of Anakin Skywalker on Tatooine and insistence on training him sets in motion events that will fulfill an ancient prophecy.

name: Padmé Amidala
description: Elected Queen of Naboo at fourteen, this courageous leader fights for her people during the Trade Federation invasion, later serving as Senator, her secret marriage and unwavering commitment to democracy placing her at galactic turmoil's heart.

name: Jar Jar Binks
description: An exiled Gungan from Naboo whose clumsy nature masks a good heart, this well-meaning outcast becomes a representative for his people, his proposal to grant emergency powers to Chancellor Palpatine having devastating consequences for the Republic.

name: Quarsh Panaka
description: Captain of the Royal Naboo Security Forces who serves Queen Amidala through the Trade Federation invasion, this loyal veteran's military expertise and devotion make him instrumental in liberating his homeworld from occupation.

name: Shmi Skywalker
description: A loving mother enslaved on Tatooine who raises her remarkable son alone, her unwavering hope and gentle strength shape Anakin's character, eventually freed and remarried to moisture farmer Cliegg Lars, finding happiness before tragedy strikes.

name: Darth Maul
description: A Zabrak Sith apprentice trained by Darth Sidious from childhood, his horned visage and double-bladed lightsaber strike fear into all who face him, dispatched to eliminate Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi during the Naboo crisis.

name: Aayla Secura
description: A Twi'lek Jedi Knight from Ryloth trained by Quinlan Vos, her striking montrals and fearless combat skills make her a respected Clone Wars general, leading the 327th Star Corps in numerous battles against Separatist forces.

name: Mace Windu
description: A formidable Jedi Master wielding a unique purple blade, his mastery of Vaapad combat makes him the Council's most dangerous member, serving as senior Council member whose unwavering confidence in Jedi principles guides the Order through war.

name: Ki-Adi-Mundi
description: A Cerean Jedi Master from the planet Cerea whose distinctive conical head houses exceptional wisdom, his logical counsel and battlefield leadership during the Clone Wars make him a respected Council voice and Separatist target.

name: Kit Fisto
description: A cheerful Nautolan Jedi Master from Glee Anselm whose ever-present smile belies legendary swordsmanship, his underwater combat expertise and infectious optimism make him a beloved Clone Wars general leading the 37th Infantry Battalion.

name: Mas Amedda
description: The blue-skinned Chagrian Vice Chair of the Galactic Senate from Champala, this ambitious bureaucrat's unwavering loyalty to Chancellor Palpatine ensures legislative efficiency, helping navigate the Republic toward authoritarian transformation.

name: Gregar Typho
description: The brave and hot-headed nephew of Captain Panaka who assumes command of Naboo's security forces, this loyal protector serves Padmé Amidala with fierce dedication, his quick reflexes tested during assassination attempts on the Senator.

name: Dooku
description: A charismatic Count of Serenno and former Jedi Master who trained Qui-Gon Jinn, this elegant aristocrat leads the Separatist movement against the Republic, his disillusionment with Jedi corruption masking allegiance to Darth Sidious.

name: Bail Prestor Organa
description: A noble Senator of Alderaan whose unwavering commitment to justice makes him a voice of reason amid corruption, his growing concern about Chancellor Palpatine's power leads him to form alliances with like-minded Senators and Jedi.

name: Jango Fett
description: The legendary Mandalorian bounty hunter from Concord Dawn who becomes genetic template for the Republic's clone army, his deadly skills and stoic professionalism make him the galaxy's most feared mercenary, hired by Count Dooku for a secret mission.

name: Lama Su
description: The tall and calculating Prime Minister of Kamino who oversees the massive cloning facilities on his oceanic world, contracted by Jedi Master Sifo-Dyas to create an army, his businesslike demeanor ensuring production proceeds without delay.

name: Taun We
description: A graceful Kaminoan administrator whose elegant presence serves as the diplomatic face of Tipoca City's cloning operations, her precise speech and calm efficiency guide visitors through facilities while carefully controlling information about their work.

name: Grievous
description: A fearsome Kaleesh cyborg from Qymaen jai Sheelal transformed into a living weapon by Count Dooku, this Separatist general hunts Jedi across the galaxy, his mechanical body allowing him to wield multiple lightsabers simultaneously with ruthless precision.
